Hello,

The package of the order 41194203 could be not delivered because the letter box is not accessible.

Please ask your customer to reschedule the delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.

Hello,

Please igore the previous message.

The package of the order 17D_93584588 could not be delivered because the address is wrong or incomplete.

Please send us the good address + the name of your customer + phone number or ask your customer to reschedule the new delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.

Valérie
